title: Distributed Systems: Principles and Paradigms
author: Andrew S. Tanenbaum
abstract: Foundational concepts in distributed systems including communication, naming, synchronization, consistency and replication.

title: MapReduce and HDFS Basics
author: Gayatri Chavan
abstract: Introductory slides explaining HDFS architecture and MapReduce workflow with examples.

title: Elasticsearch: The Definitive Guide
author: Clinton Gormley; Zachary Tong
abstract: Comprehensive guide to building search applications using Elasticsearch, including indexing, analyzers, and queries.

title: Semantic Search with BERT
author: DeepLearn Lab
abstract: Video lecture introducing embeddings and semantic retrieval with transformer models.

title: NoSQL Distilled: A Brief Guide to the Emerging World of Polyglot Persistence
author: Pramod J. Sadalage; Martin Fowler
abstract: Short guide to NoSQL databases, CAP theorem, and data modeling across document, key-value, column-family, and graph stores.

title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
author: Martin Kleppmann
abstract: Architectural patterns for reliable, scalable, and maintainable data systems; storage, stream processing, and distributed consistency.

title: Hadoop Ecosystem: Hive and Spark
author: Ananya Patil
abstract: Overview of Hive SQL on HDFS and Apache Spark for ETL and analytics; includes demos and best practices.

title: Introduction to Apache Spark
author: DataAcademy
abstract: Video tutorial on Spark RDDs, DataFrames, transformations and actions with performance tips.

title: Mining of Massive Datasets
author: Jure Leskovec; Anand Rajaraman; Jeffrey Ullman
abstract: Algorithms for analyzing large datasets including link analysis, clustering, frequent itemsets, and recommendation.

title: Introduction to Information Retrieval
author: Christopher D. Manning; Prabhakar Raghavan; Hinrich Schütze
abstract: Core IR concepts including indexing, vector space model, evaluation, web search, and machine learning for IR.

title: Elasticsearch Query DSL Deep Dive
author: Sahil Kulkarni
abstract: Scoring, analyzers, bool queries, aggregations, and pagination with examples in the ES Query DSL.

title: BERT Fine-tuning for Semantic Search
author: DeepLearn Lab
abstract: Practical guide to fine-tuning transformers for retrieval; building embeddings and ANN indexes.

title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow
author: Aurélien Géron
abstract: End-to-end ML workflows, feature engineering, neural networks, and production tips using Python libraries.

title: Consistency Models and CAP Theorem
author: Rohit Deshmukh
abstract: Explains strong vs eventual consistency, partition tolerance, and trade-offs in distributed databases.

title: Distributed Systems: Concepts and Design
author: George Coulouris; Jean Dollimore; Tim Kindberg; Gordon Blair
abstract: Comprehensive coverage of distributed system architectures, processes, communication, naming, and security.
